name: Parsleyed Cucumbers
keywords: cucumber, parsley, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish

recipeInstructions.text: Trim off the end of the cucumbers, peel and cut them in pieces 2 inches in length. Quarter each section lengthwise with a paring knife. Remove the seeds, leaving only the flesh.

Bring the water, with salt, to a boil in a saucepan. Add the cucumbers and cook for about 1 minute. Do not overcook. Drain. Return the cucumbers to the saucepan and add the butter, parsley, salt, pepper, cumin and lemon juice. Cook and toss until the butter is melted
